item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_pic: Sprawia że plecak podnosi przedmioty i ma więcej filtrów
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.filter_upgra: Filtruje przedmioty przesłane do lub z plecaka
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_fil: Filtruje przedmioty przesłane do lub z plecaka, ma więcej opcjii filtrowania
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_mag: Przyciąga przedmioty do plecaka z daleka, ma wiecej opcjii filtrowania
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.feeding_upgr: Karmi gracza jedzeniem z wyposażenia plecaka
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_fee: Karmi gracza jedzeniem z wyposażenia plecaka i można wybrać kiedy karmi
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_com: Kompresuje przedmioty\zarówno crafting 2x2 jak i 3x3 z większą ilością opcji filtrujących
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.void_upgrade: Wyrzuca, wybrane w filtrze przedmioty do pustki
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_voi: Wyrzuca, wybrane w filtrze przedmioty do pustki, ma więcej opcjii filtrowania
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.restock_upgr: Przerzuca rzeczy z wyposażenia gracza do wyposażenia plecaka jeżeli trzymany w ręce przy prawym kliknięciu
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_res:
Restocks backpack from sneak right clicked inventory
Has more filtering options
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.deposit_upgr: Deposits items from backpack into sneak right clicked inventory
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_dep:
Deposits items from backpack into sneak right clicked inventory
Has more filtering options
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.refill_upgra: Keeps refilling stack of selected items in player's inventory
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.inception_up: Makes it possible to put backpacks into the backpack
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.everlasting_:
Backpack becomes indestructible
Can't despawn or fall into void
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.auto_smeltin:
Smelting in an upgrade tab
Automatically pulls/pushes items
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.smoking_upgr: Smoking food in an upgrade tab
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.auto_smoking:
Smoking food in an upgrade tab
Automatically pulls/pushes items
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.blasting_upg: Blasting ores and metal stuff in an upgrade tab
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.auto_blastin:
Blasting ores and metal stuff in an upgrade tab
Automatically pulls/pushes items
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.crafting_upg: Crafting table in an upgrade tab
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.stack_upgrad: Multiplies the number of stacks that can fit in a slot by 2
Multiplies the number of stacks that can fit in a slot by 4
Multiplies the number of stacks that can fit in a slot by 8
Multiplies the number of stacks that can fit in a slot by 16
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.battery_upgr: Replaces part of backpack's inventory with energy storage
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.tank_upgrade: Replaces part of backpack's inventory with fluid storage
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.pump_upgrade: Pumps fluids between Tank upgrade and adjacent blocks
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.xp_pump_upgr: Pumps experience between Tank upgrade and player
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_pum:
Pumps Fluids between Tank upgrade and adjacent blocks
Works with fluid containers in hand and fluid blocks in world
Allows to filter which fluids are pumped
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.tool_swapper: Automatically swaps item in player's hand for the one effective on the block/entity when these are left clicked.
item.sophisticatedbackpacks.advanced_too:
Automatically swaps item in player's hand for the one effective on the block/entity when these are left clicked.
Has filter options and enables swapping wrench like tools for block/entity player is looking at with %s
keybind.sophisticatedbackpacks.tool_swap: Swap tool based on current block/entity
keybind.sophisticatedbackpacks.toggle_up: Switch Upgrade in the 1st Slot On/Off
Switch Upgrade in the 2nd Slot On/Off
Switch Upgrade in the 3rd Slot On/Off
Switch Upgrade in the 4th Slot On/Off
Switch Upgrade in the 5th Slot On/Off
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.status.nothin: No stacks could be restocked from inventory
No stacks could be deposited to inventory
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.status.unable: Unable to swap tool for backpack in hand. Switch to different item or empty hand.
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.status.no_too: No tool was found that works on block
No tool was found that works on entity
No upgrade present that can do tool swap on key press
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.status.backpa: This backpack cannot be open by another player
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.upgrades.butt:
Upgrades work with inventory
of main backpack first

Upgrades work with inventories
of backpacks in backpack first

Shift Click Result Into
Player's Inventory
Swaps weapon into hand when a tool is clicked on entity
Weapon is never swapped into hand
Swaps appropriate tool into hand when it holds weapon or another tool
Swaps tool into hand only if it holds another tool, does not swap for weapon
Tools are never swapped into hand
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.settings.butt: Inherited from player or overriden for this backpack
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.error.add.inc: Inception upgrade can only be placed in top level backpack
There's already Inception Upgrade in another upgrade slot
There's one or more backpacks in the backpack
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.error.add.too: There's already Tool Swapper Upgrade in another upgrade slot
gui.sophisticatedbackpacks.settings.butt: When this backpack is worn and visible another player can open it when right clicking on this player's back
